title: UC00179_School_Enrolment_Trends
name: Melbourne School Enrolment Trend Analysis and Forecasting
description: This use case explores historical school enrolment data in Melbourne, analyzing grade-level and total enrolment trends from 2021 to 2024. It applies machine learning techniques to predict 2025 enrolments and scenario-based forecasting up to 2030. The project includes visualizations, percentage breakdowns, and interactive maps for better understanding of enrolment distribution.
